alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Ector; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ector, southern Andrews and eastern Winkler Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goldsmith, or 16 miles northwest of Odessa, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Andrews, Goldsmith, West Odessa, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Notrees and Andrews County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Texas.
